title: Daily Service Worker
description: Built for individuals working as auto technicians this project is a full stack MVC application that allows a users to log, view, and keep track of the work that they have done.

title: 2018 NBA Playoff Shot Charts
description: A data visualization of each shot taken during the 2018 nba playoffs

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather web app that provides you with current and five day forecast for any city in the world.
